meanings.definition: A paved outdoor area adjoining a house.
meanings.sent1: Our family enjoys eating dinner together on the patios.
meanings.sent2: The patios at the back of the house are perfect for relaxing in the evenings.
meanings.sent3: The birds often visit the patios looking for crumbs from our meals.
meanings.sent4: The patios are like welcoming extensions of our home, connecting us to nature.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers on the patios create a cheerful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A roofless inner courtyard typically found in Spanish and Spanish-American houses.
meanings.sent1: The hotel's design includes beautiful patios where guests can relax.
meanings.sent2: In Spain, many houses have lovely patios filled with plants and fountains.
meanings.sent3: During the fiesta, the mariachi band played in the patios, adding to the festive mood.
meanings.sent4: The patios in the old hacienda whispered stories of the past to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight bathed the patios in a magical glow, enchanting all who beheld them.
